Depending on where you right-click first, the view list menu disappears from the "New Fast View" submenu on existing fast view icons, or the menu that shows when you right-click on the new nondescript fast view bar icon.
Eric, did you forget to mark this as fixed?
*** Bug 120841 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
